review: Balloon Pop is an interesting puzzle game for the Nintendo DS, but it falls short in several areas. The gameplay is engaging and addictive, especially in Versus Mode where you can compete against the CPU, which is a plus. However, the graphics are quite basic and can be a bit of a letdown, especially if you're used to more visually appealing games. The repetitive nature of the puzzles can also make the game feel less fresh over time. Overall, it's a decent game, but not one I would highly recommend.
